techmeme.title: Nvidia says the RTX 5090 has 92B transistors, 4,000 AI TOPS, and GDDR7 memory, with support for next-gen DLSS 4, which can now generate multiple frames at once (Brian Heater/TechCrunch)
Nvidia reveals the RTX 50-series Blackwell GPUs: a $1,999 RTX 5090, a $999 RTX 5080, a $749 RTX 5070 Ti, and a $549 RTX 5070, available starting in January (Tom Warren/The Verge)
After complaints from the BBC, Apple plans an Apple Intelligence update "in the coming weeks" that "will further clarify" when it is summarizing notifications (Zoe Kleinman/BBC)
Sources: Chinese state-sponsored hackers targeted the Philippine president's office and stole sensitive data as part of a yearslong, broad espionage campaign (Jamie Tarabay/Bloomberg)
Meta says it's testing an "Imagine Yourself" feature announced in September that automatically generates AI images of a user and puts them into that user's feed (Jason Koebler/404 Media)
